name: Job Market Intelligence API
description: Multi-platform job aggregator extracting structured data from Indeed and LinkedIn. Returns job title, company, location, salary, skills, work type, applicant count.
longDescription: Complete job market intelligence API aggregating listings from Indeed and LinkedIn. Extracts structured data including job titles, companies, locations, salary ranges (when available), posting dates, required skills/technologies, work arrangements (remote/hybrid/onsite), applicant counts (LinkedIn), and direct job URLs. Powered by mobile proxies for reliable access. Search by role + location with flexible result limits.
